ComicInfo.Title: Snake Hunt Part 2
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake Hunt Part 2: The Cobras based in Staten Island invade Fort Wadsworth and kidnap Sean.
